## Base32.fromBytes() method

Converts a byte array to a Base32-encoded string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromBytes(bytes: Uint8Array | number[]): Base32String;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bytes | <code>Uint8Array &#124; number[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
